subject: Re: [junit] Re: Programming By Contract
msgSnippet: ... And this is probably where the disconnect is. I don t stick in an assertion to guard against the unexpected. I stick in an assertion to document what is
messageBody:
--- Jakob Jenkov <jakob@...> wrote:
>In my point of view, as soon as you guard against something, that
>something would no longer be unexpected, would it?

And this is probably where the disconnect is. I don't stick in an
assertion to guard against the unexpected. I stick in an assertion to
document what is expected.

Regards,

Rob
